00001 <?php
00002         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/email.php");
00003         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/../models/software_comment.php");
00004         
00010         class SoftwareCommentEmail extends Email
00011         {
00012                 const default_subject = 'Commento sul software %s scritto da %s';
00013                 
00018                 public $URL;
00019 
00024                 private $comment;
00025                 
00031                 public function SoftwareCommentEmail($params)
00032                 {
00033                         if (isset($params['comment']) &&
00034                                 $params['comment'] instanceof SoftwareComment)
00035                         {
00036                                 $this->comment = $params['comment'];
00037                         }
00038                         else if (isset($params['comment_id']))
00039                         {                               
00040                                 $this->comment = new SoftwareComment();
00041                                 $this->comment->find_by_id($params['comment_id']);
00042                         }
00043                         $this->comment->belongs_to('softwares');
00044                         
00045                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00046                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00047                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00048                                 $params['subject'] :
00049                                 sprintf(self::default_subject, $this->comment->software->title, $params['name']);
00050                         $this->URL = $params['URL'];
00051                         $this->recipient = self::default_recipient;
00052                         $this->headers = "From: {$params['name']}<{$params['email']}>";
00053                         $this->text = $this->comment->text;
00054                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00055                 }
00056                 
00061                 public function make_text()
00062                 {
00063                         $moderate_url = $this->comment->moderate_url();
00064                         $discard_url = $this->comment->discard_url();
00065                         return <<<EOT
00066 Da: {$this->name}
00067 Email: {$this->email}
00068 URL: {$this->URL}
00069 IP: {$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']}
00070 User Agent: {$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']}
00071 Data: {$this->date}
00072 
00073 {$this->text}
00074 
00075 Approva
00076 <{$moderate_url}>
00077 
00078 Elimina
00079 <{$discard_url}>
00080 
00081 -- 
00082 Emeraldion Lodge
00083 http://www.emeraldion.it
00084 
00085 EOT;
00086                 }
00087         }
00088 
00089 ?>
